com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa

Class ClusterConfigServiceJPAImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa.ClusterConfigServiceJPAImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterConfigService

    @Transactional(rollbackFor={com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException.class,javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class})
public class ClusterConfigServiceJPAImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterConfigService
    Implementation of the PersistentClusterConfig interface.

                                                                                                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderBys)
        Get cluster info for various parameters. Null or empty parameters are ignored.
        Specified by:
        getClusters in interface ClusterConfigService
        Parameters:
        name - cluster name
        statuses - valid types - Types.ClusterStatus
        tags - tags allocated to this cluster
        minUpdateTime - min time when cluster configuration was updated
        maxUpdateTime - max time when cluster configuration was updated
        page - page number
        limit - number of entries to return
        descending - Whether the results should be returned in descending or ascending order
        orderBys - The fields to order the results by
        Returns:
        All the clusters matching the criteria
